page.title: 11 A FIREMAN'S AFTERNOON
page.content: The day shift had their dinner at l.00 p.m. For lunch they had meat pie, potatoes, beans and carrots. For sweet they had rice pudding. Later they played badminton in the appliance room. At 2.00 p.m. my Dad took his men on a fire safety check at Edgecombe Nursing Home. At 3.02 they were called to a kitchen fire at Thatcham. While the crew put out the fire my Dad (who is a sub-officer) wrote out some fire report notes. On returning to the station they had a cup of tea. After this the men serviced and cleaned their equipment while my Dad wrote out the fire report and organised the next day's work. He finished work at 6.00 p.m. and was home by 6.l5 p.m.
